overview: How do you make the world a garden blooming with joy? Bob, Larry, and their Veggie pals say all you need is love! This hilarious 3-in-1 collection includes: Abe and the Amazing Promise, King George & the Ducky, and Tomato Sawyer and Huckleberry Larry's Big River Rescue---plus Larry's Bible stories that teach kids about sharing, praying, and forgiveness. Approx. 120 minutes.
tagline: Featuring a faithful man who loved his family, a king who loved his duck and a river rambler who loved his friend
title: VeggieTales: Lettuce Love One Another
